meaningMnemonic:
The <kanji>hinge</kanji> <kanji>axis</kanji> of something is the <vocabulary>axis</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>pivot</vocabulary> where things hinge.

枢軸 is generally used figuratively to describe the <vocabulary>central part</vocabulary> of something important, or the center of power.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
